member.name: M:Car.driveTo(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Drives to a given destination given a starting amount of petrol

member.name: M:Car.calculateRemainingPetrol(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculates the remaining petrol, after a certain distance has been travelled. Throws an exception in case the remaining petrol is less the distance to travel.

member.name: M:Car.getDistance(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the distance to a given destination, or throws an exception in case the destination is unknown.
